title: MX Moto - Android Game
description:

Get ready to be a crazy motorist! Run as fast as you can, perform flips to get bonus. Fresh art style, perfect physics, and lots of interesting details such like destructible motorbike & motorist, deadly bombs and etc. You can even drag the rider around the map when he's off the bike. LetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s see who is on the high score board. Various tracks (c) 2010 - 2011 Djinnworks, licensed 2011 for MX Moto
19 challenging tracks, 14 rally tracks and 3 game modes.
More tracks are comming!
FEATURES:
Fabulous graphics
Realistic physics
Fun ragdoll & destructible motor
Race against your own ghost! (ghost will show the best/last ride)
Different difficulty from easy to very hard
